mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_f5 (order_code, id, recipient, phone, address, total_price, email) VALUES (#{orderCode}, #{id}, #{recipient}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{totalPrice}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_code AS orderCode, o.recipient AS recipient, p.price, od.product_cnt as productCnt, SUM(od.product_cnt * p.price) AS totalPrice, o.order_status AS orderStatus, p.product_name AS productName, p.thum_image AS thumImage, o.use_point AS point FROM order_f5 o JOIN order_detail_f5 od ON o.order_code = od.order_code JOIN product_f5 p ON od.product_code = p.product_code WHERE o.order_code = #{orderCode} GROUP BY o.order_code, o.recipient, o.order_status, p.product_name, p.thum_image, o.use_point, od.product_cnt, p.price
